name: Mushvroom
description:
First game project I undertook for the "A Game By Its Cover" Game Jam.  A fast paced racing game with drifting based on the cover below.

Controls
  • W  -  Accelerate
  • A  -  Rotate Left
  • S  -  Brake / Move Backwards
  • D  -  Rotate Right
  • E  -  Restart Level
My Fastest Times :)
  • Level 1 - 43.30 seconds
  • Level 2 - 42.77 seconds
  • Level 3 - 14.30 seconds

Try to beat me !

Credits

Thank you to Pretty Fly Games for some great tutorials <3

Some music by me and from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ and artwork by me.

Original Famicase cartridge art by SkinnyShips.
